code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic c,
    input logic d,
    output logic out
);
    always @(*) begin
        out = (c & ~d & b) | (~c & d & a);
    end
endmodule
```
[DONE]
